title: NEW: BLACKBIRD BLACKBIRD – There is Nowhere
content:
San Francisco based producer BLACKBIRD BLACKBIRD has been riding the wave of dreamy, hazy electronica since his first release.

New single There is Nowhere is no exception.

Sounding similar to contemporaries XXYYXX and Giraffage, There is Nowehere is perhaps a little predictable. That doesn’t stop the minimal production and soulful vocals leaving me longing for the chilled out summer ahead.

Take a listen below and visit BLACKBIRDBLACKBIRD.com for more.
